dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3469 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 100 Mathe Avenue in Interlachen, Florida, as the “Pamela Jane Rock Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bean of Florida (for himself and Mrs. Cammack) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 100 Mathe Avenue in Interlachen, Florida, as the Pamela Jane Rock Post Office Building.

section.header: Pamela Jane Rock Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 100 Mathe Avenue in Interlachen, Florida, shall be known and designated as the Pamela Jane Rock Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Pamela Jane Rock Post Office Building.
